es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.model

Class GameMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.model.GameMove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtaxxMove, ConnectNMove

    public abstract class GameMove
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An abstract class representing a game move.

    Clase abstracta para representar un movimiento de un juego.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameMove()
      This constructor should be used only for generating an instance to access the fromString(Piece, String) method.

    • Method Summary

      An abstract method for executing the move on the given board and a list of pieces.
      abstract GameMove fromString(Piece p, java.lang.String str)
      An abstract method for generating a game move from a string.

      Consults the piece to which this move belongs.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameMove

        public GameMove()
        This constructor should be used only for generating an instance to access the fromString(Piece, String) method. E.g., it is used in ConsolePlayer. A move that is created using this constructor will have piece equals to null, and thus cannot be executed.

        Este constructor solo se debe usar para generar instancias para acceder al metodo fromString(Piece, String). Por ejemplo, se utiliza desde ConsolePlayer. Un movimiento que utilice este constructor tiene como ficha asociada el valor null, por lo que no se puede ejecutar.

    • Method Detail

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece()
        Consults the piece to which this move belongs.

        Proporciona la ficha a la que pertenece este movimiento.

        Returns:
        A piece to which the move belongs.

        Ficha a la que pertenece el movimiento.

      • execute

        public abstract void execute(Board board,
                             java.util.List<Piece> pieces)
        An abstract method for executing the move on the given board and a list of pieces.

        Ejecuta el movimiento en el tablero board con la lista de fichas pieces.

        Parameters:
        board - A board on which the move operates.

        Tablero sobre el que se realiza el movimiento.

        pieces - A list of pieces that are involved in the game.

        Lista de fichas de todos los jugadores

      • fromString

        public abstract GameMove fromString(Piece p,
                                    java.lang.String str)
        An abstract method for generating a game move from a string. The string format depends on the actual move (@see help()).

        Genera un movimiento a partir de un string. El formato del string depende del movimiento implementado (@see help()).

        Parameters:
        str - a string that represents a move.

        String que representa un movimiento.

        Returns:
        An instance of (a subclass of) GameMove that corresponds to the move as described by cmd.

        un objeto de (una subclase de) GameMove que se corresponde con el movimiento descrito por cmd.

      • help

        public abstract java.lang.String help()
        Generates a string that describes the move. It should describe the format supported by fromString(Piece, String).

        Genera un string que describe el movimiento. Debe describir el formato soportado por fromString(Piece, String).

        Returns:
        A help message.

        Mensaje de ayuda.
